biotools.summary: neXtProt was an innovative knowledge platform dedicated to human proteins. This resource contained a wealth of high-quality data on all the human proteins that are produced by the 20'000 protein-coding genes found in the human genome. The content of neXtProt was continuously extended so as to provide many more carefully selected data sets and analysis tools. neXtProt data and tools have been archived.
